thread.title: BRIEF-Cameo Resources Corp Says Softbank Group To Acquire Up To 9.9 Pct Of Nemaska Lithium Inc's Outstanding Common Shares

title: BRIEF-Cameo Resources Corp Says Softbank Group To Acquire Up To 9.9 Pct Of Nemaska Lithium Inc's Outstanding Common Shares
text:
Company News April 17, 2018 / 12:38 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago BRIEF-Cameo Resources Corp Says Softbank Group To Acquire Up To 9.9 Pct Of Nemaska Lithium Inc's Outstanding Common Shares Reuters Staff 
April 17 (Reuters) - Cameo Resources Corp: 
* CAMEO RESOURCES CORP.: SOFTBANK GROUP MAKES STRATEGIC INVESTMENT IN NEMASKA LITHIUM’S PROPOSED WHABOUCHI MINE 
* SOFTBANK GROUP MAKES STRATEGIC INVESTMENT IN NEMASKA LITHIUM’S PROPOSED WHABOUCHI MINE 
* CAMEO RESOURCES CORP SAYS SOFTBANK GROUP INTENDS TO INVEST UP TO $99.1 MILLION TO ACQUIRE UP TO 9.9% OF NEMASKA LITHIUM INC.’S OUTSTANDING COMMON SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
